affix.word_mean: prep. & adv. 从…一边到另一边

word_mean_info__list.difference: 常和动态动词连用，指“从……上面越过”或“横越”；表静态时，指“在彼处”。
侧重从一端穿到另一端。
指沿着一条直线在水平方向上运动。一般表动态，有时也与静态动词连用。
指“从……的一边到另一边”，强调横过，多与动态动词连用。

word_group.brief_definition: 偶然发现, 无意中发现
偶然碰见, 偶然发现
整个国家；全国；全国各地
使被理解, 解释清楚
抄近路通过；径直穿过；跨越
把意思说清楚；使想法被理解

word_group.phrase: a warning shot across the bows

word_group.brief_definition: 街对面；横跨街道；在街对面

bilingual.source: You can walk across the river over Trinity Bridge.
bilingual.target: 你可以步行穿过三一桥。

bilingual.source: How did you come so far across the sea ice?
bilingual.target: 你是怎么穿过这么远的海冰来的？

bilingual.source: OK, off we go, down this path, and across the stream.
bilingual.target: 好的，我们出发，沿着这条路走，穿过小溪。

bilingual.source: Go across Dong Chang'an Jie, go along the street and turn left.
bilingual.target: 穿过东长安街，沿着这条街走然后左转。

bilingual.source: Watching them move slowly across the green grass, I'm struck by their beauty.
bilingual.target: 看着它们缓慢地穿过绿草，我被它们的美丽所震撼。

bilingual.source: Five or six men paddle each canoe across the partly-frozen St Lawrence River.
bilingual.target: 五六个人划着每艘独木舟穿过部分结冰的圣劳伦斯河。

bilingual.source: Now, with the wolves alone, the sledge shot forwards, swishing across the ice faster than any person could run.
bilingual.target: 现在，只有狼群，雪橇向前冲去，飞快地穿过冰面，比任何人跑得都快。

list.abstract: “ACROSS”品牌于2007年在香港注册成立，是一个以潮流箱包为主打的香港原创品牌。成员大都活跃于香港设计领域及资深生产领域，他们带着在各自领域的丰富经验，以及对原创潮流的热爱以及对品质的追求，成立了“ACROSS”。设计师赋予了ACROSS包包极强的机能性，隔层方便实用是ACROSS包包的一大特性。同时，设计坚持加创新多变及全方位的完整设计概念。生产制作上坚持高品质的质量守则，品质监管从包包的基本使用功能到材料的选择、配料选用等等各种细节上都不放过。
《Across》是中国内地流行乐男歌手、影视演员韩沐伯作词、作曲并演唱的一首歌曲，于2018年12月11日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: Across the bay. Ripe fruit, his hate. Two years growing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 穿过海湾，两年的酝酿，他的憎恨已到临界点。

yingyinNormal.en: He walked through forests, then across mountains, across seas. And are you sleepy yet? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们走过了森林穿过大山走过大海。现在你觉得困了吗？不困！

yingyinNormal.en: You open the door and you walk across the foyer. You hang the dry cleaning in the closet across from the staircase.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你打开门，穿过门庭，把衣服挂在楼梯对面的衣橱里。

yingyinNormal.en: 22 girls in a cluster zig-zagging across a field like a busted Roomba.
yingyinNormal.zh: 22个小女孩挤成一团，像个坏掉的吸尘器一样之字形穿过球场。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm a sea captain, sailing across the sea. We are jolly pirates, shivery timbers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我实在海上航行的船长，穿过茫茫的大海。我们就是快乐的海盗，你就放马过来吧。啊哈！

yingyinNormal.en: I'm a sea captain, sailing across the sea. We are jolly pirates, shiver me timbers
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是在海上航行的船长，穿过茫茫的大海。我们就是快乐的海盗，你就放马过来吧。啊哈！

yingyinNormal.en: I no longer wanted to get across the jungle, but instead wanted to find greater and greater challenges to go after, surrounded by great people working together on a shared journey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不再想穿过丛林，而想与身边出色的人一起追寻更多更大的挑战分享旅程最后任务的胜利。

yingyinNormal.en: These footprints look very real. Are you sure there is no living dinosaurs about, Grampy Rabbit? Quite sure, Daddy Pig. Over the boulders, everyone. Across the bridge. Through the cave.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这些脚印看上去非常大。你确定这里面真的活着的恐龙吗，兔爷爷？我百分之百的确定，猪爸爸。跟着我跳过巨石。再走过小桥。穿过山洞。

yingyinNormal.en: Captain Dog likes sailing across duck ponds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 狗船长很喜欢在鸭子池塘驾船航行。

yingyinNormal.en: This is ridiculous. I'm going across the hall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这实在太荒唐了，我要去对面屋待一会。

yingyinNormal.en: Mayors across the country are doing their part.
yingyinNormal.zh: 全国各地的市长们也在尽自己的力量。

yingyinNormal.en: This urban transformation is spread across China.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种城市化进程遍及整个中国。

yingyinNormal.en: Joey, there is a perfectly good couch across the hall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 乔伊，走廊对面有很好的沙发。

yingyinNormal.en: DEA's office is across town, but they're sending back up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 缉毒局在城市的那头，他们派支援赶过来了。

yingyinNormal.en: Across the country, over 36,000 wind turbines dot the landscape.
yingyinNormal.zh: 整个国家有36000多个风力涡轮机遍布在这里。

yingyinNormal.en: How? By detonating six backpack bombs simultaneously across the city.
yingyinNormal.zh: 怎么？在全城同时引爆六个背包炸弹。

yingyinNormal.en: Physicists have mapped this cosmic microwave background across the universe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 物理学家已经绘制出了穿越宇宙的这种宇宙微波背景。

yingyinNormal.en: Captain Dog likes sailing across duck ponds. Everyone likes sailing across duck ponds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 狗船长很喜欢在鸭子池塘驾船航行。大家都喜欢在鸭子池塘驾船航行。

yingyinNormal.en: That bogey came across the border and then I lost you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那个不明物体越过了边界，之后我就找不到你了。

yingyinNormal.en: Now, I figured since I'd run this far, maybe I'd just run across the great state of Alabama. And that's what I did. I ran clear across Alabama.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这时我想既然我跑了那么远，也许我可以跑遍亚拉巴马州。我就这么做了，我横越整个亚拉巴马。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 给人...印象；表达清楚；偶然发现
整个国家；全国；全国各地

sense_info_list.en: in every part of a particular place or country

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Across</highlight> the country, factory owners are now grappling with a new challenge: Instead of having too many workers, they may end up with too few.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在全国范围内，工厂老板们现在正着力应对一个新的挑战：他们最终可能面临的不是工人过剩，而是工人短缺问题。

examination_example.sentence: Some relatively poor European countries have seen huge improvements <highlight>across</highlight> measures including civil society, income equality and the environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些相对贫穷的欧洲国家在民权社会、收入公平和环境方面有着巨大的改善。

examination_example.sentence: School districts <highlight>across</highlight> the country, most recently Los Angeles Unified, are revising their thinking on this educational ritual.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全国的学区，最近一次是洛杉矶联合校区，正在改变他们对这种教育仪式的看法。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Across</highlight> generational lines, Americans continue to prize many of the same traditional milestones of a successful life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 纵观历代美国人，他们仍然推崇很多不变的成功生活的传统里程碑。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Across</highlight> the Atlantic came successive groups of Englishmen, Frenchmen, Germans, Scots, and many others who attempted to transplant their habits and traditions to the new world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一批又一批英格兰人、法国人、德国人、苏格兰人等人跨越大西洋，试图将他们的习惯和传统带到这个新世界。

examination_example.sentence: A century ago, the immigrants from <highlight>across</highlight> the Atlantic included settlers and sojourners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个世纪以前，横跨大西洋的移民中有定居者，也有旅居者。

examination_example.sentence: comes <highlight>across</highlight> as reliable evidence
examination_example.sentence_trans: 给人以可靠证据的印象

examination_example.sentence: Yet rather than empowering teachers to find what works best for their students, the policy imposes a flat, <highlight>across</highlight>-the-board rule.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这项政策并没有授权教师去发现什么对他们的学生最有效，而是施加了一个统一的、全面的细则。

sense_info_list.en: to or on the opposite side of

exam_freq_info.chinese: 横跨; 穿过; 对面

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: to or on the opposite side of
sense_info_list.zh: 横跨; 穿过; 对面

examination_example.sentence: Most people feel nervous sitting <highlight>across</highlight> from a hiring manager, answering questions that effectively open themselves up for judgment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数人坐在招聘经理的对面，回答让自己接受评判的问题时会感到紧张。

examination_example.sentence: The strategy has had a significant effect on sales, particularly as the hype (炒作) slows <highlight>across</highlight> the season.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该策略对销售方面有显著的影响，特别是当整个赛季的炒作有所减缓时。

examination_example.sentence: It is a powerful communication medium that simultaneously provides immediate, frequent, permanent, and wide-reaching information <highlight>across</highlight> the globe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是一种强大的通信媒介，同时在全球范围内提供即时、频繁、永久和广泛的信息。

examination_example.sentence: They are useful in comparing cultural values <highlight>across</highlight> time and space.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们有助于跨时间和空间地比较文化价值观。

sense_info_list.en: so as to pass, go over, or intersect at an angle

adv. 在船尾；向船尾
adv. 在床上

表示处于某种状态 "…的"。

去, 往, 朝, 向, 接近

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 使

sample.mean: prep. & adv. 沿着；顺着；循；延伸；带来；与…一起；在…期间；进展

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 表示“相对”
动词表示“交叉, 横过, 越过, 反对”。形容词表示“生气的, 交叉的, 相反的”。名词表示“十字架, 十字路, 交叉”。
钩子, 弯曲

sub.word_mean: n. 十字形（或叉形）记号

word_affix.word_mean: prep. & adv. 从…一边到另一边

word_usage.usage:
across表“横过, 到...的另一边”，词性为副词或介词，不可作动词。
示例：他们同时越过终点线。 
误 They acrossed the finishing line together.
正 They crossed the finishing line together.

across后常加from，表“在对面”，from可省略。
示例：There is a school just across from our house.
有一所学校就在我们房子对面。

across和through的区别：
across多指从物体表面“穿过”，而through指在三维空间内移动“穿过”。
示例：我穿过树林。
误 I walked across the forest.
正 I walked through the forest.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指"从…的一边到另一边", 强调横过, 多与动态动词连用。
指沿着一条直线在水平方向上运动。<highlight>一般表动态</highlight>, 有时也与静态动词连用。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 整个国家；全国；全国各地

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: in every part of a place

examination_example.sentence: Barran started a "Let's Talk Loneliness" campaign that sparked difficult conversations <highlight>across</highlight> Britain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Barran发起了一场“让我们谈谈孤独”的运动，在英国各地引发了艰难的对话。

examination_example.sentence: This month, more than4 million students <highlight>across</highlight> the nation will begin high school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本月，全国将有400多万学生开始上高中。

examination_example.sentence: The gender pay gap based on median salaries <highlight>across</highlight> the sector in 2016-2017 was 13.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 2016-2017年，基于行业工资中位数的性别工资差距为13。

sense_info_list.en: to or on the opposite side of

examination_example.sentence: He walked <highlight>across</highlight> the stage as the audience cheered.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他在观众的欢呼声中走过舞台。

examination_example.sentence: Such momentary thoughts were represented in words and passed down <highlight>across</highlight> generations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种瞬间的想法被用文字表达出来，代代相传。

examination_example.sentence: There are also stark differences in pay <highlight>across</highlight> grades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不同职系的薪酬也存在着明显的差异。

examination_example.sentence: The fact that attitudes toward self-driving cars appear to be so steady <highlight>across</highlight> generations suggests how transformative the shift to driverless cars could be.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，几代人对自动驾驶汽车的态度似乎如此稳定，这表明向无人驾驶汽车的转变是多么具有变革性。

examination_example.sentence: You have to get <highlight>across</highlight> what it is about a particular area that has inspired you.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你必须了解激发你灵感的特定领域。

examination_example.sentence: If you don't arouse someone's curiosity or brighten someone's day, you probably come <highlight>across</highlight> as being a little bit dull.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果不能激起某人的好奇心或给某人的一天增添点儿乐趣，你可能会给人留下一点沉闷的印象。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: to or on the opposite side of

examination_example.sentence: After a long and careful search, Greg saw, <highlight>across</highlight> a field, the dog moving cautiously away.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经过长时间的仔细搜寻，格雷格看见那只狗穿过一片田野，小心翼翼地走开了。

examination_example.sentence: The Sichuan Restaurant and the old fish shop <highlight>across</highlight> the street from our middle school are gone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们中学街对面的四川餐馆和老鱼店都不见了。

examination_example.sentence: To construct a working still, use a sharp stick or rock to dig a hole four feet <highlight>across</highlight> and three feet deep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 建造一个可工作的静止装置，要用一根锋利的棍子或石头来挖一个四英尺宽、三英尺深的洞。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指"从…的一边到另一边"，强调横过，多与动态动词连用。
指沿着一条直线在水平方向上运动。<highlight>一般表动态</highlight>，有时也与静态动词连用。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 横跨; 穿过; 在...的对面

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 整个国家；全国；全国各地

sense_info_list.en: to or on the opposite side of
sense_info_list.zh: 横跨; 穿过; 在...的对面

examination_example.sentence: People race against horses <highlight>across</highlight> the hills and mountains.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们跨越丘陵和山脉与马匹赛跑。

examination_example.sentence: Every week, David sets off <highlight>across</highlight> the countryside to faraway villages with his two donkeys.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每周，大卫都会带着他的两头驴穿越村子，前往遥远的村庄。

examination_example.sentence: When he tested a homemade part in his bathroom, it shot water <highlight>across</highlight> the room.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当他在浴室里测试自制部件时，部件把水溅到了房间里。

sense_info_list.en: in every part of a particular place or country

examination_example.sentence: Windbreaks have covered <highlight>across</highlight> all provinces of China.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 防风林已覆盖中国所有省份。

examination_example.sentence: Many schools <highlight>across</highlight> the country have shut their doors due to the coronavirus outbreak.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于冠状病毒的爆发，全国许多学校都关门了。

examination_example.sentence: They travelled <highlight>across</highlight> China and more than 20 countries over the world, including Italy, Thailand and Singapore.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们游历了中国和世界20多个国家，包括意大利、泰国和新加坡。

examination_example.sentence: He came <highlight>across</highlight> robbers (强盗).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他遇到了强盗.

examination_example.sentence: Second, write down any important words that you come <highlight>across</highlight> when reading or listening.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，写下你在阅读或听力中碰到的任何重要单词。

examination_example.sentence: The next morning, as I was looking listlessly over the papers at breakfast, I came <highlight>across</highlight> this paragraph:
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第二天早上，当我吃早餐，无精打采地看报纸时，我看到了这段话：

sense_info_list.en: on or over a part of the body

examination_example.sentence: You can improve an ice-cream headache by rapidly rubbing your tongue <highlight>across</highlight> the roof of your mouth to help warm up things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以通过用舌头快速摩擦上颚来加热食物，从而改善因冰淇淋而引起的头痛。

word_affix.word_mean: prep. & adv. 从…一边到另一边

word_usage.usage:
across表“横过, 到...的另一边”，across是介词，而cross是动词，go/walk across =cross。
示例：他们同时越过终点线。 
误 They acrossed the finishing line together.
正 They crossed the finishing line together.

across后常加from，表“在对面”，from可省略。
示例：There is a school just across from our house.
有一所学校就在我们房子对面。

across和through的区别：
across多指从物体表面“穿过”，而through指在三维空间内移动“穿过”。
示例：我穿过树林。
误 I walked across the forest.
正 I walked through the forest.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation:
多指从一定范围的一边到另一边，且在物体的表面上或沿着某一条线的方向进行的动作，其含义常与介词on有关。
例：He will take part in an important race across the Atlantic.
他将参加一次重大的横渡大西洋的比赛。

也可表示从某一范围的一端到另一端的动作，但它表示的动作是在空间里进行的，其含义常与介词in有关。
例：We drove right through the town centre.
我们开车正好穿过镇中心。

当over用作“穿过；通过”之意时，表示到达一个高的障碍物（如树、墙、篱笆和山脉等）的另一侧的动作。
例：She climbed over the wall.
她翻过墙去。
